meanings.definition: A pungent yellow or brown paste made from the crushed seeds of certain plants, typically eaten as a condiment.
meanings.sent1: I added a dollop of mustard to my hot dog.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich tasted better with a hint of mustard.
meanings.sent3: Why did the hot dog blush? Because it saw the mustard dressing!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sharp and pungent as mustard.
meanings.sent5: The mustard's tangy flavor lingered on my taste buds.

meanings.definition: A plant of the cabbage family with yellow flowers, which are used to make mustard.
meanings.sent1: The mustard plant in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Farmers harvest mustard plants to produce the condiment.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cabbage refuse to play hide-and-seek? Because it was always mustard!
meanings.sent4: The field of mustard plants swayed in the gentle breeze like a golden sea.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant yellow of the mustard flowers brightened the entire field.
